Package com.caoccao.javet.interop.loader

Class JavetLibLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.caoccao.javet.interop.loader.JavetLibLoader
  • public final class JavetLibLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    The type Javet lib loader is the one that actually loads the JNI library based on JS runtime type. It is managed by a dedicated classloader (not the default classloader) so that unload is possible. It is not supposed to be called directly by the applications via the default classloader.

    It accepts a listener which can specify: (1) To deploy the JNI library to a custom location to work around the permission issues. (2) To skip the JNI library deployment to improve the performance and reduce the jar file size.

    Since:
    0.8.0
